DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare two different type decision support material patient consider treatment chest pain chest discomfort heart disease .
DOC.brief_title: Comparative Effectiveness Decision Aids Stable Chest Discomfort
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose project compare effectiveness detail , video patient decision aid online , interactive patient decision aid treatment Stable Chest Discomfort . The study randomly assign eligible participant receive either online decision aid video decision aid . Participants complete survey review decision aid examine decision quality , use intervention , satisfaction intervention .
DOC.criteria: Adults 18 old English speak Current diagnosis stable angina Ability access online material willing provide email address Coronary bypass surgery and/or percutaneous coronary intervention within 6 month Diagnosis unstable angina , acute coronary syndrome , STEMI , non STEMI within 6 month Scheduled nonelective catheterization Significant cognitive deficit participant unable consent self Serious comorbidities condition make revascularization inappropriate
